thread.title: BRIEF-FMC Announces Executive Leaders For Planned New Lithium Materials Company, Appoints New FMC Chief Financial Officer

title: BRIEF-FMC Announces Executive Leaders For Planned New Lithium Materials Company, Appoints New FMC Chief Financial Officer
text: March 9, 2018 / 12:38 PM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-FMC Announces Executive Leaders For Planned New Lithium Materials Company, Appoints New FMC Chief Financial Officer Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 9 (Reuters) - Fmc Corp: * FMC ANNOUNCES EXECUTIVE LEADERS FOR PLANNED NEW LITHIUM MATERIALS COMPANY, APPOINTS NEW FMC CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER * SAYS ANDREW SANDIFER APPOINTED CFO * ‍PIERRE BRONDEAU WILL SERVE AS CHAIRMAN OF BOARD OF NEW LITHIUM MATERIALS COMPANY​ * PAUL GRAVES BEEN APPOINTED CEO OF NEW LITHIUM MATERIALS COMPANY Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
